reviewText: super fast delivery.  Item as described.
great movie!
This movie is hilarious and illustrates how "political correctness" can go too far and be very funny.
Great price and product
This is a hilarious college movie on par if not better than Animal House.  Great acting by Piven and others.  A must see if you love Animal House.

The best college movie ever.

Period.

Yes, I've seen Animal House.

PCU is a wonderful satire of how stupid being overly politically correct is and how it's a huge negative for the value of colleges in America. And it does this while entertaining you with meat tossing, George Clinton, and with a decisive explanation of why majoring in a 5000 year old dead language is stupid.

It took me forever to find this movie on DVD! It just isn't the same with the good parts taken off and with commercials on some random cable channel. This is one of my favorite movies and it made my day that I found it!!!
Great movie, good actors Just as all the other posts say about  the movie Animal House compared to this movie.
23 years later, it's still funny, and so true.
Super awesome

Didnt play

Horribly disappointed

This is the Animal House of the 90s.  Not quite as epic, but especially today you should watch it.  It seemed silly at the time all the lefty PC groups, but as 22 years have shown, it was a warning of the whiny safe spacer types that infest our society today.
"Well, here's all you need to know. Classes: nothing before eleven. Beer: it's your best friend, you drink a lot. Women? You're a freshman, so it's pretty much out of the question."
Yes very good
This movie should be required viewing for all college freshman..at how silly pc b.s. is
loved it
If you are sick of all the PC expletive I strongly suggest this old school comedy. If you are a PC sensitive person pass this by
This is a great paridy of modern political correctness
Crazy 90's college movie was ok, but I was please to see P-Funk! :-)
Not as funny as I thought I'd be
Great movie, still cracks me up. A funny (and also sadly ironic) story about becoming too Politically Correct and trying not to offend anyone (sound like society today at all???)
Very simple DVD, no menus, just plays like a VHS. Movie is hilarious, though.
Great movie!
Everybody needs to watch this movie. Especially those that bitch about political correctness. funny, entertaining and just hits home with all the crap today.... but it was made back in the 90's
Awesome
Hilarious
Funny throwback to the 90s and present facination with political correctness. And you just can't beat George Clinton and the Parliament Funkadelic!
PCU, more relevant today than when it came out!!, Funny with a point.... We watched it with a friends 13 year old daughter, at the end she told us she knows people like that, shaking her head......
So happy to have this in my collection....
Love it!
I had never seen this movie before but it populated in the "suggested movie" category based on my other purchases. No words can really capture how insanely awful it is.
Awesome movie. Arrived as described with fast shipping. No complaints!!
Always loved this movie
Good

I used to watch this movie when I was a kid and it is still pretty funny. It is your typical college frat movie. Beer, parties, women, and rebellion against authority. George Clinton and P Funk are in this movie so that is a bonus if you like funk. For the price it is a good buy.
Hilariously wrong movie for all the right reasons!
Great movie!  Always love it but it was very hard to find on disc.  Funny thing is, like Idiocracy, it is more of a documentary now than fiction.  If you haven't seen it yet, check it out.
Awesome movie great quality product. Fast shipping!
Great fun.  Like Animal House.
I love this movie! Just plain fun
Hit theaters as a satirical comedy but today should be viewed more as a documentary.
A prescient movie that was satire in the 90's and has now become all too real.
A movie that is hilarious & almost prophetic with the world & politics as is. Must see!
Timeless and Hilarious!
Funny as hell and is prophetic look at what is now happening in higher education.  PC out of hand and protests merely for protests sake.  Best performance by Jeremy Piven!  Worth every penny!!!!
This is an awesome and underrated movie!!!
